text: Ristolas is a former commune in the Hautes-Alpes department and Provence- Alpes-Côte d'Azur region in southeastern France. It is now part of Abriès- Ristolas. == Geography == Ristolas is in the Cottian Alps. The Guil river passes through the village. == Transport == === Road === The D947 and D947T roads pass through Ristolas. == Population == == References == Category:Former communes in Hautes-Alpes
